text: Isai Limen () was a port town of Magnesia in ancient Thessaly, mentioned in the Periplus of Pseudo-Scylax.Periplus of Pseudo-Scylax, 65. Its site is unlocated. ==References== Category:Populated places in ancient Thessaly Category:Former populated places in Greece Category:Ancient Magnesia Category:Lost ancient cities and towns
title: Isai Limen
